description: • Novak Djokovic is one win away from a calendar grand slam and 21st major title

title: Bush alludes to US Capitol rioters when condemning violent extremists behind 9/11 attacks
Britain's Emma Raducanu defeats Canada's Leylah Fernandez in all-teen US Open final
How Europe's doors are slamming shut for Americans
Australian man with chronic pain sets world record by holding plank for over 9 hours
description: Nine hours, 30 minutes and 1 second.

title: The 'vast minority' who are vaccine-resistant are circulating Covid
description: As the US averages more than 1,000 Covid-19 deaths daily, not getting vaccinated is akin to driving while intoxicated, one health expert said Friday.

title: This Bentley is $2 million, roof not included
description: There was a slight drizzle when I was getting ready to go for a short drive in Bentley's new Bacalar. Ordinarily, this would not be a big deal. The rain was hardly enough to warrant an umbrella. Except the Bentley Bacalar has no roof.

title: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck return to the red carpet together
description: Bennifer 2.0 is red carpet official.

title: This balloon could take you to space, if you've got $125,000 to spare
description: Space Perspective is a human space flight company with bold ambitions to take paying customers to the edge of space, for a hefty price tag. Tickets are now available for flights starting in 2024.

title: Leader and founder of Peruvian Shining Path rebel group dies in prison
description: Abimael Guzman, the founder of the Peruvian rebel group Shining Path, known as 'Sendero Luminoso' in Spanish, died in prison on Saturday, according to the country's National Penitentiary Institute. He was 86.

title: Bush compares domestic violent extremists to 9/11 terrorists
description: On the 20th anniversary of the September 11 terrorist attacks, Former President George W. Bush says that dangers to the US that come from overseas and violent extremism at home are "children of the same foul spirit."

title: Israeli police recapture four of six escaped Palestinian prisoners
description: Israeli police say four of the six men who escaped from a prison in Northern Israel on Monday have now been recaptured.

title: Summer saw much of Europe open up to US residents, but the season's end has brought with it new restrictions
An up-close look at how a Florida hospital fights to save Covid-19 patients
description: A woman in a Florida hospital is struggling to breathe.

title: Ticket agent who checked in terrorists reflects on 9/11
description: Former US Airways ticket agent Mike Tuohey opens up about the grief he's felt since September 11, 2001 when he checked in two of the terrorists at a Portland airport before they flew to Boston where they would hijack the plane that crashed into the North Tower of the World Trade Center.

title: Prince Andrew served with legal papers for sex abuse lawsuit, Virginia Giuffre's lawyers claim
description: A process server for Virginia Roberts Giuffre's legal team attempted service on UK's Prince Andrew by delivering legal documents to The Royal Lodge in Windsor, England, according to New York court documents.

title: A man on trial who was shot during a courtroom scuffle has died, officials say
description: A man who was shot by a police officer after allegedly trying to take a bailiff's weapon inside a North Carolina courtroom has died, state investigators said.

title: Nadia Nadim: 'I'm actually the picture of everything the Taliban don't want their women to be'
description: Nadia Nadim remembers the moment she fell in love with football.

title: How Covid-19 attacks those who aren't fully vaccinated
description: CNN's Randi Kaye reports from St. Anthony's Hospital in St. Petersburg, Florida, where nearly all of the ICU beds are filled with Covid-19 patients.

title: Super Typhoon Chanthu makes landfall in the Philippines
description: Super Typhoon Chanthu made landfall in the far northern Philippines on Saturday, bringing destructive winds and heavy rain to the archipelago.

title: Cuba, Israel and Phu Quoc announce reopening plans
description: Fall is almost here, we're approaching our seventh season of living with a pandemic, and yes, it still sucks.

title: CDC study: Unvaccinated 11 times more likely to die from Covid-19
description: With more than 75 million eligible Americans still not vaccinated, hospitals in many states overwhelmed and fears that cases could grow further in the fall, experts and officials are scrambling to slow the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Florida auto repair shop owner wins $1 million lottery on his first day of business
description: A Florida man's dreams came true when he opened his own auto repair shop. But life got even sweeter when he won a $1 million lottery on his first day of business.

title: Australia's Queensland could go into lockdown after cluster of coronavirus cases detected
description: Australia's third-most populous state said on Saturday it may order a snap lockdown after a cluster of Covid-19 cases, as the country posted a record one-day rise in daily infections.

title: Novak Djokovic is one win away from a calendar grand slam and 21st major title
description: Novak Djokovic is one win away from a record-breaking 21st major title and the first calendar grand slam in men's singles since 1969.

title: 'This pandemic is our World War II.' An up-close look at how a Florida hospital fights to save Covid-19 patients
CNN fact-checker debunks false claim about viral Air Force text message
description: False claims went viral about Air Force pilots and the Pentagon's Covid-19 vaccine mandate for members of the military. CNN's Daniel Dale fact checks.

title: The Taliban want to impose their version of Sharia law. Afghans just want to get paid
The Taliban want to impose their version of Sharia law. Afghans just want to get paid
How 9/11 forged an age of political turmoil
description: America went into battle on September 11, 2001, united in defense of its values and way of life.

title: Capitol riot defendant stays jailed after lashing out over 'Foxitis' assertion
description: • More US Capitol riot defendants plead guilty

title: More US Capitol riot defendants plead guilty
description: Seven US Capitol riot defendants pleaded guilty on Friday to charges related to the January 6 insurrection, including one man who threatened to shoot House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.
